languages.text: {n}Сервитор касается вас. В глубинах полумашины-получеловека раздается треск — и вас бьет разрядом тока. Остальные сервиторы вздрагивают, но остаются недвижимы.{/n}

{n}The servitor touches you. Something in the depths of the man-machine crackles — and you are hit by an electrical discharge. The sound causes the other servitors to flinch but they otherwise remain motionless.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сервитор касается вас. В глубинах полумашины-получеловека раздается треск — и вас бьет разрядом тока. Остальные сервиторы вздрагивают, но остаются недвижимы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The servitor touches you. Something crackles in its guts — and you are hit by an electrical discharge. The crackle causes the other servitors to flinch, but they remain motionless.{/n}
{n}The servitor touches you. Something crackles in its guts — and you are hit by an electrical discharge. The crackle causes the other servitors to flinch, but they remain motionless.{/n}
{n}The servitor touches you. Something crackles in its guts — and you are hit by an electrical discharge. The sound causes the other servitors to flinch, but on the whole they remain motionless.{/n}
{n}The servitor touches you. Something crackles in its guts — and you are hit by an electrical discharge. The sound causes the other servitors to flinch, but on the whole they remain motionless.{/n}

{n}The servitor touches you. Something in the depths of the man-machine crackles — and you are hit by an electrical discharge. The sound causes the other servitors to flinch but they otherwise remain motionless.{/n}

{n}The servitor touches you. Something in the depths of the man-machine crackles — and you are hit by an electrical discharge. The sound causes the other servitors to flinch but they otherwise remain motionless.{/n}

languages.text: {n}机仆触碰到了你的身体。这台人型机器的身体深处传来了噼啪声，你遭到了电击。听到这个声音，其他的机仆似乎是像要朝后退去，但他们的身体却依然一动不动。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor touches you. Something in the depths of the man-machine crackles — and you are hit by an electrical discharge. The sound causes the other servitors to flinch but they otherwise remain motionless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}奴工触碰到了你的身体。这台人型机器的身体深处传来了噼啪声，你遭到了电击。听到这个声音，其他的奴工似乎是像要朝后退去，但他们的身体却依然一动不动。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El servidor te toca. Algo en el interior de la máquina humana chisporrotea y recibes una descarga eléctrica. El sonido hace que los otros servidores se encojan, pero por lo demás permanecen inmóviles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor touches you. Something in the depths of the man-machine crackles — and you are hit by an electrical discharge. The sound causes the other servitors to flinch but they otherwise remain motionless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El servidor te toca. Algo en el interior de la máquina humana chisporrotea y recibes una descarga eléctrica. El sonido hace que los otros servidores se encojan, pero por lo demás permanecen inmóviles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}サーヴィターが体に触れる。人造機械の奥底で何かがパチパチと音を立て、体に雷で打たれた衝撃が走る。その音を聞いて他のサーヴィターはたじろいだものの、それでも静止状態を貫いていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor touches you. Something in the depths of the man-machine crackles — and you are hit by an electrical discharge. The sound causes the other servitors to flinch but they otherwise remain motionless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴィターが体に触れる。人造機械の奥底で何かがパチパチと音を立て、体に雷で打たれた衝撃が走る。その音を聞いて他のサーヴィターはたじろいだものの、それでも静止状態を貫いていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Servitor berührt dich. Etwas in den Tiefen der Menschmaschine knistert – und du wirst von einem elektrischen Schlag getroffen. Das Geräusch lässt die anderen Servitoren zusammenzucken, aber davon abgesehen bleiben sie bewegungslos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor touches you. Something in the depths of the man-machine crackles — and you are hit by an electrical discharge. The sound causes the other servitors to flinch but they otherwise remain motionless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Servitor berührt dich. Etwas in den Tiefen der Menschmaschine knistert – und du wirst von einem elektrischen Schlag getroffen. Das Geräusch lässt die anderen Servitoren zusammenzucken, aber davon abgesehen bleiben sie bewegungslos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le servitor vous touche. Quelque chose crépite dans les tréfonds de l'hybride homme-machine et vous recevez une décharge électrique. Le son fait sursauter les autres servitors qui demeurent cependant immobiles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor touches you. Something in the depths of the man-machine crackles — and you are hit by an electrical discharge. The sound causes the other servitors to flinch but they otherwise remain motionless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le servitor vous touche. Quelque chose crépite dans les tréfonds de l'hybride homme-machine et vous recevez une décharge électrique. Le son fait sursauter les autres servitors qui demeurent cependant immobiles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hizmetör sana dokunuyor. İnsan makinenin derinliklerinde bir şey çatırdıyor. Elektrik boşalmasıyla çarpılıyorsun. Ses, diğer hizmetörlerin de irkilmesine neden oluyor. Ancak sonrasında başka bir harekette bulunmuyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor touches you. Something in the depths of the man-machine crackles — and you are hit by an electrical discharge. The sound causes the other servitors to flinch but they otherwise remain motionless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Servitör sana dokunuyor. İnsan makinenin derinliklerinde bir şey çatırdıyor ve bir elektrik boşalmasıyla çarpılıyorsun. Ses, diğer servitörlerin de irkilmesine neden oluyor ama aksi takdirde hareketsizler.{/n}
